Comments_List: Learned the history of Spain from like 1930 to present day. This is also a culture course so we took fun trips and learned about cultural aspects of Spain.
I practiced my language skills and learned about Spanish culture, which helped prepare me for my study abroad.

Strengths: Very in depth history of Spain, taught in Spanish since culture and language go hand in hand.

Weaknesses: I wished this game focused more on the cultural aspects of Spain, it felt very much like a history class as opposed to a history and culture class.
Yes, it was fantastic and the excursions we took were extremely fun and interesting
